alert.note: Alert for Norman (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 13 at 9:28AM CDT until April 17 at 4:00PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Minnesota... Wild Rice River (MN) at Twin Valley affecting Norman County. .An ice jam was reported downstream of the gauge yesterday causing an initial rise to around flood stage. Expecting another rise into minor flood stage due to snowmelt runoff and forecast rainfall. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING FOR SNOWMELT NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL MONDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Wild Rice River (MN) at Twin Valley. * WHEN...Until Monday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 10.0 feet, MINOR FLOOD STAGE. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:45 AM CDT Thursday the stage was 9.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage tomorrow afternoon to a crest of 10.5 feet Saturday morning. It will then fall below flood stage late Sunday morning. - Flood stage is 10.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely. Safety message - Turn around, don`t drown. Don`t travel through flooded areas. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
